name: Tonzurakko
description:
Help your sea otter swim toward victory as you evade hungry killer whales and water hazards galore! As you splash your way toward your goal you will be challenged by dizzying whirlpools, deadly frozen icebergs and sea creatures looking to make you their next meal. But, snag shellfishes and use them as either turbo speed boosts or as projectiles to keep your sea faring foes at bay.

Play solo or grab a friend and help your otter swim to freedom using a single PSP® system.

Download Tonzurakko today!



"PlayStation" and the "PS" Family logo are registered trademarks of Sony Computer Entertainment Inc.
